channel.title: Custom Faces Endpoints on Custom Twemoji API
channel.description: Recent content in   Custom Faces Endpoints on Custom Twemoji API

item.title: GET `/custom_faces/{base_emoji}`
item.description: Use this endpoint to combine face Twemojis using one as a base. Arguments Name Required Type Default base_emoji ✅ String (emoji) none head ❌ String (emoji) base emoji cheeks ❌ String (emoji) base emoji mouth ❌ String (emoji) base emoji nose ❌ String (emoji) base emoji eyes ❌ String (emoji) base emoji eyewear ❌ String (emoji) base emoji headwear ❌ String (emoji) base emoji other ❌ String (emoji) base emoji Chart.

item.title: GET `/custom_faces/mashup`
item.description: Use this endpoint to combine two or more face Twemojis. Arguments Name Required Type Default amount ❌ Integer 2 emojis ❌ String (comma separated emojis) none use_every_feature ❌ Boolean false head ❌ Float 1.

item.title: GET `/custom_faces/random`
item.description: Use this endpoint to randomly combine face Twemojis. Arguments Name Required Type Default head ❌ Float 1.0 cheeks ❌ Float 0.5 mouth ❌ Float 0.5 nose ❌ Float 0.
